origination.corpname: Michigan. Justice of the Peace (Ypsilanti : Township)

did.unittitle: Michigan. Justice of the Peace (Ypsilanti : Township) records 1874-1910
did.abstract: Justice, civil and criminal docket books of the first and second districts of Ypsilanti township, Washtenaw County, Michigan.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The provenance of the record group is unknown.

accruals.p: No further additions to the papers are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Michigan. Justice of the Peace (Ypsilanti : Township) records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The justice of the peace for Ypsilanti township in Washtenaw County, Michigan was responsible for hearing and deciding cases, both civil and criminal.

scopecontent.p: The docket books are arranged by district and then by category: justice, civil, and criminal.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Courts.
Justices of the peace--Michigan--Ypsilanti (Township)
